text: kraoyomk nowpel del anak noam damnoeng rikreay ban mk dl ke( bng you so hv) kaban kroveasa av noh leu phtaimoukh robsa keat ( aupouk) haey keat kaban meulkheunh laengvinh . keat ban pol tha tae yeung minban brab puok anak te ryytha yeung pitchea doengpi a l laoh nouv avei del puok anak mindoeng noh
